## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                             | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `loading` | `loading` | Displays the loading icon on screen when set to `true`. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
